statements: SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM SupplyChainData;
SELECT supplier_name, price, order_date FROM SupplyChainData WHERE quantity >= 100;
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainData WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, supplier_name, quantity, price FROM SupplyChainData WHERE quantity > 50 AND supplier_name = 'ABC Inc' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, price FROM SupplyChainData WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND order_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainData ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT supplier_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM SupplyChainData GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING total_quantity > 500 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, supplier_name, quantity FROM SupplyChainData WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY supplier_name, quantity DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_name FROM SupplyChainData ORDER BY supplier_name LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, quantity, order_date FROM SupplyChainData WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY order_date DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE price < 100.00 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT product_id, quantity_sold, revenue FROM sales ORDER BY revenue DESC, quantity_sold ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 AND price < 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE price >= 50 AND quantity <= 20;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, quantity_sold, revenue FROM sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT inventory.product_name, sales.revenue FROM inventory INNER JOIN sales ON inventory.product_id = sales.product_id WHERE sales.revenue > 1000 ORDER BY sales.revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM orders WHERE total_price < 1000;
SELECT * FROM suppliers
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50 ORDER BY product_price DESC
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_price FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, revenue FROM sales ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location, product_name, price FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location='New York';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id WHERE products.price < 50;

SELECT supplier_name, SUM(price * quantity) AS total_revenue FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id GROUP BY supplier_name;
SELECT product_name, order_date FROM products JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id WHERE orders.order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY ProductName DESC;
SELECT ProductName, Quantity, Price FROM Inventory WHERE Price > 50;
SELECT SupplierName, ContactName, ContactEmail FROM Suppliers;
SELECT OrderID, OrderDate, Quantity, Price FROM Orders WHERE Quantity >= 10 ORDER BY Price ASC;
SELECT ForecastID, Timestamp, ForecastDate, ForecastedQuantity FROM Forecasting ORDER BY Timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE Price > 50
SELECT ProductName, Quantity FROM Inventory ORDER BY Quantity DESC
SELECT SupplierName, ContactEmail FROM Suppliers WHERE SupplierID = 2
SELECT CustomerName, ContactName, ContactEmail FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = 1
SELECT ProductName, ForecastedQuantity FROM Forecasting WHERE ForecastDate = '2022-12-31'
